JITSIRTC.allowExternalUsersHint: If a user joins the Jitsi meeting outside of FVTT, show them to players in the FVTT interface. (URL will visible to users here after enabling this option).
JITSIRTC.externalUsersUrlHint: The URL for standalone Jitsi users to join the conference. Cannot be changed.
JITSIRTC.resetRoomHint: Reset the meeting room ID used on your selected Jitsi server. This will also cause the Standalone Jitsi URL to change.
JITSIRTC.useJitsiMeetHint: Use the full Jitsi Meet web interface instead of the built-in audio/video display
JITSIRTC.customUrlsHint: Enable to allow custom MUC, Focus, or Bosh URLs. (Settings will be available here after enabling this option).
JITSIRTC.debugHint: Enables CONFIG.debug.av and CONFIG.debug.avclient for extra logging
